attributes.action: vote on break up of the union
attributes.additional_details:
The vote for Scottish Independence is not only a vote for them to be separate its a effectively a vote to break up the union of United Kingdom and Northern Ireland  and will effect all of the UK, so why do only the Scots get to vote on it?
If you think that you should get a say on the future of the make up of the United Kingdom and not leave it to just 10% of the population please sign this petition.
